about_the_game:
Tentworks Interactive Presents: Becoming Pablo – Demo

Welcome to the pre-Alpha demo of Becoming Pablo! This demo gives you a taste of the high-stakes strategy and cartel management gameplay in our upcoming grand strategy game. Set in Colombia, you'll experience the early stages of building your cartel, managing production, and defending your operations.

What’s Included in the Demo?

✅ Play through a part of the Colombia campaign
✅ Establish your base of operations and manage production lines
✅ Experience turn-based combat and defend your territory with tower defense mechanics
✅ Navigate cartel diplomacy with limited political and economic choices
✅ Encounter dynamic events that shape your empire

This is a work-in-progress pre-Alpha build, and we’d love your feedback to help shape the final game. Wishlist Becoming Pablo and join our community on Discord to share your thoughts!

content_descriptors.notes: The game showcases buying & selling of drugs and some amount of gun violence.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater

short_description: Becoming Pablo is a turn-based grand-strategy game where you build and lead a cartel empire. Conquer territories, manage your operation, and outsmart rivals in the gritty 70s-90s drug trade era. Every choice impacts your rise to power—or your downfall. Can you dominate the underworld?
